column2: The Crystal Pony religion centers around the worship of the Crystal Heart, with grand ceremonies and rituals to send messages from those in the mortal plane to the fallen in the 'crystal' plane.
The Sky Lord, Soaron, gave the gift of flight to the first Pegasi, deigning them as his servants.
The Pony Mother, Epona, gave unto unicorns magic, deigning them as her servants upon the world.
